item.title: Introducing Robotium – A Testing Framework for Android
item.description: Robotium is an open source testing framework for Android applications. It makes it easy to write complex black-box test cases. Test driven development is a methology where tests are written before the actual application. Write a testcase Watch it failing Write the actual source code in you application which enables the test to pass Watch the test passing Go back to step 1 The following video gives you an introduction into Robotium:
